meanings.definition: A type of pasta shaped like a bow tie.
meanings.sent1: I cooked some delicious farfalle for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef served farfalle with tomato sauce.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they pretended to wear farfalle as bow ties.
meanings.sent4: The colorful farfalle danced in the boiling water.
meanings.sent5: The unique shape of farfalle makes it fun to eat.

meanings.sent1: The athlete will farfalle across the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel farfalle up the tree to escape the dog.
meanings.sent3: The excited puppy farfalle around the yard chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to farfalle by as they enjoyed the party.
meanings.sent5: The leaves farfalle off the tree in the autumn breeze.
